OCD.name: ConfigurationChangePublisher
OCD.description: The ConfigurationChangePublisher defines a CloudPublisher instance that allows to publish configuration change events.

AD.name: Qos
AD.description: The desired quality of service for the log messages that have to be published. If Qos is 0, the log message is delivered at most once, or it is not delivered at all. If Qos is set to 1, the message is always delivered at least once.

AD.name: Retain
AD.description: Default retaing flag for the published messages.

AD.name: Priority
AD.description: Message priority. Priority level 0 (highest) should be used sparingly and reserved for messages that should be sent with the minimum latency. Default is set to 7.
